span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 预防接种： to inoculate with a vaccine in order to produce immunity to an infectious disease, such as diphtheria or typhus
【例】 vaccinate sb. for smallpox 为某人接种牛痘疫苗以防天花
【近】 immunize

【记】 vac 空 + in 进入，使里面空，给皮肤打一针起泡
